p: The major components were trans-anethole ( 1) (36.8%), p-anisaldehyde ( 2) (7.7%), α-ethyl- p-methoxybenzyl alcohol ( 3) (9.1%), carvone (4.9%), 1-phenylpenta-2,4-diyne (4.7%) and fenchyl butanoate (4.2%). The main three compounds ( trans-anethole, p-anisaldehyde, α-ethyl- p-methoxybenzyl alcohol) are both ethers, having methoxy functional groups ( Scheme 1).
